name: Imaginary Powers
description:
• Art and code by me, marylikesgames.
  • BGM and SFX from Andrea Baroni of Cyberleaf Studio
  • Monogram font by datagoblin
  • Made over the weekend for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

===== SLIGHT SPOILERS BELOW =====

The theme is "It is NOT real".

In this game, you play as the imaginary number i. Your powers correspond to the powers of i, which switch between real, imaginary, positive, and negative numbers like so:

i0 = 1
i1 = i
i2 = -1
i3 = -i
